full_summary:
*Tender: Office Seating for Various Floors in Vancouver*

**Notice Details**

* Reference Number: WS3891783052
* Solicitation Number: WS3891783052
* Publication Date: April 12, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 10, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (PST)
* Amendment Date: May 1, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Provided
* Expected Contract End Date: December 29, 2023

**Tender Information**

* The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply, delivery, and installation of Office Seating for 1138 Melville Street, Vancouver.
* The proposed contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.
* The contractor must provide seating for various floors of the mentioned facility.

**Contract Details**

* The selected contractor will be required to provide a supply, delivery, and installation of office seating to meet the needs of Indigenous Services Canada and Crown-Indigenous Relations and Norther Affairs Canada.
* The contractor will be required to meet the specifications outlined in the RFP, including the manufacture, supply, and delivery of the office seating within the specified timeframe.
* The expected contract end date is December 29, 2023.

**Contact Information**

* For more information, please contact Kristina Mikulova (SPAC/PSPC) at [kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
* Please note that the deadline for tender submission is indicated in the RFP documents.

You may access the RFP documents through the [Ariba Procurement Platform](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15977422?extsite=MTU5Nzc0MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Ensure that you carefully review all RFP documents before submitting your proposal.

We appreciate your interest in this tender opportunity and look forward to reviewing your proposals.
